mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select o.orderno, to_char(o.orderdate, 'YY-MM-DD HH:MI')as orderdate, o.userid, o.arr, o.arrtel, o.arrzipcode, o.arraddr, o.arrdetailaddr, o.request, o.pluspoint, o.usepoint, o.usecoupon, o.deliveryprice, o.totalprice, o.status, s.pname from ordertbl o join (select orderno, listagg(pname,',') within group (order by pname) as pname from suborder group by orderno) s on o.orderno=s.orderno order by rownum desc) where rownum<=#{pageNum} * #{onePageNum} order by rownum asc) where rownum <= #{lastPageRecord}#{onePageRecord} order by rownum desc

select o.orderno, o.orderdate, o.arr, o.arrtel, o.arraddr, o.arrdetailaddr, o.request, o.status, o.usepoint, o.usecoupon,o.totalprice, s.subno, s.orderno, s.pno, s.optno, s.quantity, s.subprice, s.pname from suborder s join ordertbl o on s.orderno = o.orderno where s.orderno=#{param1}
select count(rownum) as totalRecord from ordertbl
